name: places/ChIJ0WR3SoNZwokRJFw-HCfRYHY
formattedAddress: 336 E 5th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 336 E 5th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I used to love this salon. I won’t be going back. When I sat down, the stylist said “oh you just had a baby right”…I said “no.” She said “that must be someone else who looks exactly like you.” What she wasn’t aware of is that I just had an unsuccessful embryo transfer and gained 40 lbs during the IVF process, so I was devastated by this comment.  Dye was already in my hair so I stayed. The coloring service was HORRIBLE. I asked for a specific tone, and I was told it was not fully possible (fine), so I responded that I wanted to confirm my priority is to cover my grays. I confirmed that twice. I did not have a cut scheduled, so I did not sit under the dryer. By the time I got home, gray hair was visible. The color did not cover grays and is also inconsistent. Sad to say I won’t be returning here after 5 years.

originalText.text:
Worse hair cut and blow dry by sunny. The hair cut was uneven and did not match the pics. Sunny yanked at my hair and damaged it during blow dry . Gave me a severe headache. The blow dry was frizzy by the time I got home.
And after all that charged me a whopping 200 bucks. I called the owner Alexandra but she will not answer the phone saying she's too busy. With clients .
Alexandra Please give me a refund. No money can make up for damaging my hair. But at least refund my money
Your stylist sunny doesn't know anything about hair.
Any potential clients , Please save your hair and your purse. Do not go to this salon.

originalText.text:
My son cuts his hair here. I went for the first time yesterday and HANDS DOWN I appreciated Kayla for taking the time to talk to me about hair care, suggesting products and just teaching me about my hair. I appreciate her. They now have a loyal customer out of my son and now me.
Thank you

text.text:
My son cuts his hair here. I went for the first time yesterday and HANDS DOWN I appreciated Kayla for taking the time to talk to me about hair care, suggesting products and just teaching me about my hair. I appreciate her. They now have a loyal customer out of my son and now me.
Thank you

originalText.text: One of the worst haircuts I’ve ever gotten. They spent a very short amount of time looking at my hair before starting to cut. The cut itself was very quick, and they cut it dry - I have had plenty of dry cuts before, and afterwards they are supposed to adjust it and make sure both sides are even. They dried it terribly, and took out all the curl. You can see in these pictures, the straight one is after going to filament and having them dry it “curly”, and the other one is how it looks when I do it with some effort. I expect professionals to be able to make my hair look like MY hair, even if, as they said, well, they’ve never done my hair before. Naturally at the end when they asked me if anything needed adjusting (shouldn’t they know, though?), I had no way of knowing because my hair looked crazy. Don’t go here if you have very fine hair and a mixed curl pattern.

originalText.text: Been coming here for years! Best in the city for curly hair.  I fly back from the Caribbean every year to go to them.  Kayla, Sonny, and Alex are all awesome.
